threads.title: 820-5509 Mac mini RAM upgrade no boardview
threads.message:
Hi, i want to upgrade the ram here. found in the schematics RAMCFG 3..2 and 1..0
but wich resistors ? without boardview that will be a problem. can someone help me ?

i have Hynix 4GB RAM Moduls

So that will be 100K to R2291
and 10K to R2284,R2282, R2280

and to pull out in R2292, R2290, R2294, R2281

need help to find that on the mainboard

threads.title: 820-5509 Mac mini RAM upgrade no boardview
threads.message: nobody any idea? i nowhere found a boardview
